item.title: Forget About Online Groypers. Instagram Influencers Will Be The Real Death Of America
item.description: The Instagram army is motivated and militant — but they're not informed.

item.title: You Can’t Have A Secure Border Without Deportations
item.description: Abandoning deportations would be a capitulation to Democrat demands when doing so has the potential to do massive damage to the rule of law across the...

item.title: Minnesota GOP Is Right To Run On Dem Fraud And Chaos This Election Year
item.description: The GOP is painting the ruling DFL as a party of fraud and lawlessness. If facts matter, Republicans will be back in power in the blue state.

item.title: If You Can’t Eat On $15 Per Day, You Might Have Bad Food Habits
item.description: Teaching people how to cook real food isn’t oppression, austerity, or punishment; it's independence and agency.

item.title: Obergefell Has Harmed Children For Far Too Long
item.description: It’s now clear that the law cannot simultaneously uphold a child’s right to their mother and father and affirm same-sex marriage.
